alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 3:33PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN LEWIS AND SOUTHERN ADAMS COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 332 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Tollesboro, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... West Union, Manchester, Tollesboro, Rome, Concord, Trinity, Dunkinsville, Carrs, Ribolt, Bentonville, Cedar Mills and Herron Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
